page.title: 10ORSETT COCK AMENITIES.
page.content: The Orsett Cock Pub incorporates a midday restaurant.Mr.Roger Hiett,the manager is extremely helpful and friendly.The restaurant has a quite extensive menu ranging from egg on toast to fillet steak and includes Spaghetti Bolognaise,among others,all at reasonable prices.There are hot and cold snacks available in the bar as well.This bar is a large,single room centrally heated and air conditioned.It offers live Disco on Thursdays;Fridays and Saturdays,andcaters for weddings and functions too. On the left of the A128 going towards Brentwood is Orsett Hall,once the home ofColonel and Lady Whitmore,this is now a restaurant,and caters for wedding receptions and larger functions as well as providing midday and evening meals.
